name: Thomas J. BUSHYAGER, Appellant, v. Harry D. SHARGEL, Esquire

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Thomas J. BUSHYAGER, Appellant, v. Harry D. SHARGEL, Esquire.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Roger S. Spalding, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Harry D. Shargel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
524 A.2d 490
Thomas J. BUSHYAGER, Appellant, v. Harry D. SHARGEL, Esquire.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 10, 1987.
Decided April 20, 1987.
Roger S. Spalding, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Harry D. Shargel, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson, zappala and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
